title: Inquiry-Based Science Education Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Systematic learning for pre-service teachers to design science inquiry lessons and strengthen competencies in analyzing, revising, and developing actual instructional materials.

learning_goals: Participants can clearly explain the five principles of inquiry-based science lesson design
Participants can analyze existing science instructional materials and propose three strategies to strengthen inquiry elements
Participants can design student-led science inquiry projects reflecting agency in PBL environments
Participants can develop inquiry learning assessment rubrics utilizing digital tools (BYOD)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
